companyDescription: AI-driven platform for Organizational Decision Intelligence (ODI) that transforms workforce data into insights for management consulting, private equity firms, and hedge funds

businessFunctions.description: Transformed ML pipeline from requiring multiple specialists to single engineer management, automated classification processes
Processes 200+ million titles and industry pairings, automated report generation for clients
Delivers personalized reports and insights to private equity and hedge fund clients

implementation.approach: Integrated Claude via Amazon Bedrock with existing AWS infrastructure including SageMaker
implementation.timeline: Reduced from 2-3 months to 30 minutes for classification processes

quantitativeMetrics.context: Overall classification accuracy across all industries
quantitativeMetrics.source: We ran four different models across competitors, and with Claude we had close to 94% accuracy

quantitativeMetrics.context: Perfect accuracy in tech, finance, and medical sectors
quantitativeMetrics.source: Claude achieving 100% accuracy in tech, finance, and medical sectors

quantitativeMetrics.context: Title classification time reduced from 2-3 months to 30 minutes
quantitativeMetrics.source: Reduced title classification time from 2-3 months to a 30-minute automated process

quantitativeMetrics.context: Lowered unclassified data rates across industries
quantitativeMetrics.source: Lowered unclassified data rates to under 8% across industries

qualitativeBenefits.description: Eliminated need for 4-5 engineering sprints previously required for fine-tuning
qualitativeBenefits.source: Claude eliminated the need for four to five engineering sprints previously required for fine-tuning

qualitativeBenefits.description: Enabled serving more clients while maintaining lean startup structure
qualitativeBenefits.source: This efficiency allows them to serve more clients while maintaining their lean startup structure

qualitativeBenefits.description: Captures crucial industry context that manual approaches couldn't handle
qualitativeBenefits.source: This manual approach couldn't capture crucial industry context
